reviewText: We couldn't watch them in any of our DVD players.
Love this Cartoon!!!! Just wish I could get volumes 5 & 6 for Region 1 so I can watch them on a US DVD player.  Does anyone know if there is anything out yet?

The last installment of the Huntik series, season 4 contains their season finale which like a lot of Japanese anime doesn't exactly end the way we're used to.  Still it was a decent conclusion to the series.  I have loved it from the first episode.  It is designed for a younger audience so it is very kid friendly.  I would recommend it as a family show.
